Hotels • Restaurants • Minimart • Pharmacy • Clothing • Jewelry • Shuttle Service

Since 1985, Sani Dental Group stablished in Los Algodones, Mexico and years later it became the largest dental clinic in town offering high-quality treatments and services, such as restaurants, lodging, shuttle, and more. Now, with decades of experience, Sani Medical Tourism has born with the same vision of providing a complete and unique medical experience for those in need of recover their health.
